channel.title: Help changing ip
channel.description: ok im using matrix client and disturbed source its 667/704 and im trying to make a webclient and first when im just trying to play it works but i was following a guide on youtube on making a 704 webclient and i did everything right that the guy did and when the guy in the vid tried to run the client it didnt work and he said oops forgot to change ip back and it worked for him but it still doesnt work for me because i dont know what ip im supposed to change my client files too it was set to 127.0.0.1 and i know im supposed to change it but what ip do i change it to?

item.title: Help changing ip
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

master roshi:

why cant u just answer my fucking question and help me out ffs im learning ok

Becasue you don’t have to use the source, why would you want to sue this source? it sucks…use a better, one. I’m not answering my question for your benefit

item.title: Help changing ip
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

I’m tired of everyone using matrix source AKA PI V2, it’s getting annoying as shit really, if you can’t fix something so simple, then why bother with the server.You’re going to run into even more larger problems then this. Leeching will get you no where, just find a better and less common source and work from that. Trust me, I’m positive if you host that server you’ll get barley ‘any’ players. For these reasons.

  1. I doubt you change anything they’ll make it presentable.
    2.It’s overly used.

I suggest this source,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


it’s pretty good but you have to fix an anti leech in the client, which means noob leechers can’t take it :3. It should take no less then 12 minutes with eclipse.

Read full topic

item.description:

ok im using matrix client and disturbed source its 667/704 and im trying to make a webclient and first when im just trying to play it works but i was following a guide on youtube on making a 704 webclient and i did everything right that the guy did and when the guy in the vid tried to run the client it didnt work and he said oops forgot to change ip back and it worked for him but it still doesnt work for me because i dont know what ip im supposed to change my client files too it was set to 127.0.0.1 and i know im supposed to change it but what ip do i change it to?
